system.description:
When this spell is cast, a glowing sword made of magical energy appears next to the caster. The caster may direct the sword to attack any creature within 30 feet simply by concentrating.

Combat Details:

  • The sword attacks twice per round.
  • It attacks using the caster's attack rolls and level.
  • Deals damage as a two-handed sword (1d10).
  • Can hit any target, including those requiring magical weapons to be harmed.

Rules & Mechanics:

  • The caster must concentrate to control the sword.
  • If concentration is broken, the sword stops attacking but remains in existence.
  • The sword remains for 1 round per caster level.
  • It cannot be destroyed except by Dispel Magic (normal success chance) or a Wish.
